Movie Synopsis
Based on a novella by Junichi Watanabe, but with minor changes, Namida Tsubo tells the story around a magazine editor who loses his wife to cancer and keeps her ashes in a jar. In coping with her death, he finds solace with his sister-in-law. During this time, the two become enamored with one another and begin dating, but he then becomes overwhelmed by guilt.
